text: ABB Group is a power and automation company based in Zürich, Switzerland. It is one of the world's largest engineering multinationals with operations in around 100 countries. The company has five divisions: Power Products, Power Systems, Discrete Automation & Motion, Low Voltage Products and Process Automation. Category:1988 establishments in Europe Category:1980s establishments in Switzerland Category:Companies based in Zürich
title: Asea Brown Boveri
